languages.text: "Мастер дисциплины Иокаста лично взялась за их допрос, и ей удалось сломать самых стойких. Если коротко — мы узнали, что они хотели уничтожить часть десятины и отступить. Странное поведение для пиратов, не находите? Последний вместе со своими потрохами выплюнул: "Когда вы вернетесь на Даргонус, будет уже поздно". Не знаю уж, что именно это значит".

"The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."
languages.original_text: "Мастер дисциплины Иокаста лично взялась за их допрос, и ей удалось сломать самых стойких. Если коротко — мы узнали, что они хотели уничтожить часть десятины и отступить. Странное поведение для пиратов, не находите? Последний вместе со своими потрохами выплюнул: "Когда вы вернетесь на Даргонус, будет уже поздно". Не знаю уж, что именно это значит".

traits.locale_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

"I'm sorry to say it, Lord Cap'n, but they're all dead. When it all kicked off, they tried to steal a shuttle and scurry back to their crew. One son of a grox survived the fight, but then he took a poison capsule before anyone could stop him."

"The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

"I'm sorry to say it, Lord Cap'n, but they're all dead. When it all kicked off, they tried to steal a shuttle and scurry back to their crew. One son of a grox survived the fight, but then he took a poison capsule before anyone could stop him."

I don't know what that means exactly."

I don't know what that means exactly."

"The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

languages.text: «La maestra de armas se ha encargado personalmente del interrogatorio y ha arrancado una confesión a los más recalcitrantes. En resumidas cuentas, hemos descubierto que pretendían destruir parte del diezmo y luego batirse en retirada. Un comportamiento muy extraño para tratarse de piratas, ¿no le parece? El último escupió una advertencia de lo más misteriosa junto con lo que quedaba de sus tripas: «Para cuando volváis a Dargonus, ya será demasiado tarde». Ignoro a qué se refería exactamente».
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

traits.locale_text: «La maestra de armas se ha encargado personalmente del interrogatorio y ha arrancado una confesión a los más recalcitrantes. En resumidas cuentas, hemos descubierto que pretendían destruir parte del diezmo y luego batirse en retirada. Un comportamiento muy extraño para tratarse de piratas, ¿no le parece? El último escupió una advertencia de lo más misteriosa junto con lo que quedaba de sus tripas: «Para cuando volváis a Dargonus, ya será demasiado tarde». Ignoro a qué se refería exactamente».

languages.text: “戒律大师亲自审讯了那群杂种，就算有人铁了心不想开口，她也撬开了那些人的嘴巴。总而言之，他们打算销毁一部分什一税资源，然后赶紧撤退。对海盗来说，这还真够怪的，你觉得呢？最后那个人临死的时候说了这么一句怪话：‘等你们回达戈努斯的时候，一切都晚了。’我也不知道他这话到底是什么意思。”
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

traits.locale_text: “戒律大师亲自审讯了那群杂种，就算有人铁了心不想开口，她也撬开了那些人的嘴巴。总而言之，他们打算销毁一部分什一税资源，然后赶紧撤退。对海盗来说，这还真够怪的，你觉得呢？最后那个人临死的时候说了这么一句怪话：‘等你们回达戈努斯的时候，一切都晚了。’我也不知道他这话到底是什么意思。”

languages.text: 「マスター・アット・アームズが自ら彼らの尋問を行い、最も手強い者たちから自白を引き出すことに成功しました。要するに、彼らは租税の一部を破壊して撤退しようとしていたことがわかりました。海賊としては奇妙な行動だと思いませんか？最後の一人は、内臓とともに謎めいた警告を吐き出しました。『お前たちがダルゴナスに戻る頃には、もう手遅れだ』と。正確に何を意味するのかはわかりません」
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・アット・アームズが自ら彼らの尋問を行い、最も手強い者たちから自白を引き出すことに成功しました。要するに、彼らは租税の一部を破壊して撤退しようとしていたことがわかりました。海賊としては奇妙な行動だと思いませんか？最後の一人は、内臓とともに謎めいた警告を吐き出しました。『お前たちがダルゴナスに戻る頃には、もう手遅れだ』と。正確に何を意味するのかはわかりません」

languages.text: "Die Waffenmeisterin hat die Verhöre persönlich durchgeführt und konnte auch die Widerspenstigsten knacken. Kurz gesagt, wir haben erfahren, dass sie einen Teil des Zehnts zerstören und sich dann zurückziehen wollten. Ein seltsames Verhalten für Piraten, findet Ihr nicht auch? Der Letzte hat zusammen mit seinen Eingeweiden noch eine kryptische Warnung ausgespuckt: 'Wenn Ihr wieder auf Dargonus seid, wird es zu spät sein.' Ich weiß nicht, was das genau bedeutet."
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

traits.locale_text: "Die Waffenmeisterin hat die Verhöre persönlich durchgeführt und konnte auch die Widerspenstigsten knacken. Kurz gesagt, wir haben erfahren, dass sie einen Teil des Zehnts zerstören und sich dann zurückziehen wollten. Ein seltsames Verhalten für Piraten, findet Ihr nicht auch? Der Letzte hat zusammen mit seinen Eingeweiden noch eine kryptische Warnung ausgespuckt: 'Wenn Ihr wieder auf Dargonus seid, wird es zu spät sein.' Ich weiß nicht, was das genau bedeutet."

languages.text: « La capitaine d'armes s'est personnellement chargée de les interroger, et elle a su délier la langue des plus revêches. En résumé, nous avons appris qu'ils cherchaient à détruire une partie de la dîme avant de prendre la fuite. Un drôle de comportement pour des pirates, vous ne trouvez pas ? Le dernier a craché un mystérieux avertissement avec ses entrailles : "À votre retour sur Dargonus, il sera trop tard." Je ne sais pas vraiment comment l'interpréter. »
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."

traits.locale_text: « La capitaine d'armes s'est personnellement chargée de les interroger, et elle a su délier la langue des plus revêches. Le dernier a craché un mystérieux avertissement avec ses entrailles : "À votre retour sur Dargonus, il sera trop tard." Je ne sais pas vraiment comment l'interpréter. »

languages.text: "Silahtar, sorguları bizzat yürütüp en dirençli olanları kırmayı başardı. Kısacası aşarın bir kısmını yok etmek ve geri çekilmek istediklerini öğrendik. Korsanlar normalde yapmayacağı bir şey, öyle değil mi? Sonucu, gördüğü muamelenin ardından 'Dargonus'a döndüğünüzde çok geç olacak.' şeklinde gizemli bir uyarıda bulundu. Neyi kastetmiş olabileceğini bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms handled their interrogation personally, and she managed to break the most resistant ones. In short, we learned that they wanted to destroy part of the tithe and retreat. Strange behaviour for pirates, wouldn't you agree? The last one spat out a cryptic warning along with his entrails: 'By the time you get back to Dargonus, it will be too late.' I don't know what that means exactly."
